inclusion.criterion: Postmenopausal status (amenorrhea for at least 12 months)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Application of estrogen or cyclic estrogen/progestin preparation other than the study medication for at least 6 months prior to Visit 1
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Relevant impairment of well-being and mood inspite of estrogen therapy (confirmed by questionnaire scores)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Uterine bleeding of unknown etiology within the last 2 years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous or existing or suspected carcinoma of the breast
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Any malignant disease in the last 5 years
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of thromboembolic events or existing thromboembolic processes
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior hormone replacement therapy with androgens within 12 months prior to Visit 1
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Major life events within the last 12 months prior to Visit 1
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of breast cancer, which may be a contraindication for this study. However, further evaluation is needed to determine eligibility.
